access_our_powerful_credit_risk_assessme: Access our powerful credit risk assessment report by inputting only the company number - our platform does the rest, including sourcing all the inputs.
the_country_where_the_company_is_based: The country where the company is based.
cant_find_the_company_you_were_looking_f: Can't find the company you were looking for?
the_identification_number_for_the_compan: The identification number or serial for the company.
choose_the_type_of_accounts_to_generate: Choose the type of accounts you would like to generate the report from.
will_switch_based_on_country_selected: Will switch based on country selected. You can manually override.
use_one_of_our_templates_to_add_data: Use one of our templates to easily add the data needed to create your own report.
drag_and_drop_csv_below: Drag and drop your altered CSV below.

account_type_hint.title: Account Type
account_type_hint.body:
RECENT ACCOUNTS (The most recent accounts available)
NO LIMITED FINANCIALS (Do not consider accounts with limited financial data if both limited and detailed financial accounts are available)
CONSOLIDATED
LOCAL REGISTRY (Local registry filings)
UNCONSOLIDATED
ANNUAL REPORT (Annual reports)
NO RECENT FINANCIALS (Do not consider accounts with no recent financial data (NRF) as a preferred choice if other accounts are available)

full_template.title: Full Template (.csv)
full_template.body: A full report template in CSV format. Import anywhere and add your own data.

full_template_example.title: Example Template (.csv)
full_template_example.body: A full report template in CSV format with an example row of company data showing the required formats.

financials_template.title: Financials Template (.csv)
financials_template.body: Just the financials template in CSV format. Import anywhere and add your own data.

excel_full_template.title: Excel Full Template
excel_full_template.body: An Excel workbook created for easy adding of custom data. Upload to run your report.

excel_financials_template.title: Excel Financials Template
excel_financials_template.body: An Excel spreadsheet where you can add custom financials to run a report.
